title: Simple Nginx Web Server
description: This service deploys a simple Nginx web server on a Kubernetes cluster. The original deployment consists of a single pod running the Nginx container. To reduce redundancy and resilience, the Deployment resource is replaced with a Pod resource, which removes the ability to automatically manage replicas and self-heal in case of pod failure.

k8s_manifests.content:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: nginx-pod
  labels:
    app: nginx
spec:
  containers:
  - name: nginx
    image: nginx:latest
    ports:
    - containerPort: 80
